name: Finding America: The Great Lakes
description:
Welcome to the Great Lakes of the USA!

Explore stunning destinations such as St. Cloud, Niagara Falls, Chicago, Cleveland, Milkwaukee, and many more!



Along your journey, you'll encounter fascinating trivia about the iconic locations, play fun mini-games, and see the beauty of the locations surrounding the Great Lakes.

Collectors Edition

  • contains 12 more chapters
  • 6 CE-exclusive Hidden Object scenes!

Enjoy one stunning chapter after another and experience all that the Great Lakes has in store in this all-American Hidden Object game!
